title: Create or Update Periods of Accounting

periodsOfAccount.description:
Indicates whether the customer has periods of account.

If this value is true then periodsOfAccountDates must be submitted.

periodsOfAccountDates.description:
List of periods of account. These must be submitted if a customer has periods of account.

If periodsOfAccount is set to false, then this value should not be submitted.

startDate.description: The start date of the period of account.

endDate.description: The start end of the period of account.
